info.title: Platformatic DB
info.description: Exposing a SQL database as REST

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new node to the database.

put.description: Update one or more nodes in the database.

get.description: Fetch Node using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more nodes from the Database.
